translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ma h'a y'a na la k'a na sa mu tstsa ya /
analyzed: ma h'a y'a na la k'a na sa mu tstsa ya /
translated: Mahāyānalakṣaṇasamuccaya

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid kun las bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid kun las bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Compendium of Characteristics of the Great Vehicle

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva!

original: byang chub yang dag sems bskyed pa'i //
analyzed: byang chub yang dag sems bskyed pa'i //
translated: The generation of the perfect mind of enlightenment

original: byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba ste //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba ste //
translated: Is the application of great loving-kindness.🔽The declaration of the wisdom

original: chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i //🔽zhes bya ye shes mngon par brjod //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i // zhes bya ye shes mngon par brjod //
translated: That all phenomena are selfless.

original: ces te de ltar na chos thams cad gang zhe na /
analyzed: ces te de ltar na chos thams cad gang zhe na /
translated: Thus, what are all phenomena?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: The aggregates, elements, sense bases, dependent origination, perfections, levels, emptiness, factors of awakening, truths, concentrations,

original: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sngon gyi gnas kyi rjes su mnyam par gzhag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mnyam gzhag dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sngon gyi gnas kyi rjes su mnyam par gzhag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mnyam gzhag dang /
translated: the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the meditative concentrations, the meditative attainments, the bases of subjugation, the bases of totality, the bases of mastery, the bases of the formless realm, the liberations, the supernatural knowledges, the meditative concentrations,

original: 'dzin pa dang / stobs dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
analyzed: 'dzin pa dang / stobs dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
translated: the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇīs, the powers, the ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, the irreversible wheel of the Dharma, the Dharma,

original: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / don dam pa chos kyi dbyings shes pa'o //🔽de ltar phung po ni ci zhe na /🔽skye mched ni gang /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / don dam pa chos kyi dbyings shes pa'o // de ltar phung po ni ci zhe na / skye mched ni gang /
translated: the fruits of the spiritual life, omniscience, suchness, the very limit of reality, the absence of marks, and the ultimate expanse.🔽“What are the aggregates?”🔽“What are the sense spheres?”

original: khams ni gang /
analyzed: khams ni gang /
translated: “What are the elements?”

original: ji ltar nges pa mtshan nyid @296b ji lta yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar nges pa mtshan nyid @296b ji lta yin te /
translated: How can one be certain about the characteristics of the aggregates?🔽The five aggregates are form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: phung po lnga ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de ltar gzugs ni dbang po lnga mig la sogs pa dang / yul lnga'o //🔽gzugs la sogs pa'o //🔽de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa la brten nas /🔽sa la sogs pa rab tu dang ba ste /
analyzed: phung po lnga ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de ltar gzugs ni dbang po lnga mig la sogs pa dang / yul lnga'o // gzugs la sogs pa'o // de ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa la brten nas / sa la sogs pa rab tu dang ba ste /
translated: Form is the five sense faculties such as the eye, and the five sense objects such as visible form.

original: mig gi dbang po'o //🔽de ltar rna ba'i dbang po la brten nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽snga'i dbang po la brten nas snga'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po'o // de ltar rna ba'i dbang po la brten nas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o // snga'i dbang po la brten nas snga'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The sense faculty of the eye is the clear form that is derived from the four great elements.🔽In the same way, the sense faculty of the ear is the clear form that is derived from the four great elements.

original: lce'i dbang po la brten nas lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: lce'i dbang po la brten nas lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The sense faculty of the nose is the clear form that is derived from the four great elements.🔽The sense faculty of the tongue is the clear form that is derived from the four great elements.

original: lus kyi dbang po la brten nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po la brten nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: The sense faculty of the body is the clear form that is derived from the four great elements.

original: gzugs ni gnyis te kha dog dang dbyibs so //
analyzed: gzugs ni gnyis te kha dog dang dbyibs so //
translated: Form is of two kinds: color and shape.

original: kha dog ni sngon po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kha dog ni sngon po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Color is blue, etc.

original: yang dag par gnas pa ni gru bzhi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par gnas pa ni gru bzhi la sogs pa'o //
translated: Shape is square, etc.

original: sgra dang yid kyi shes pa ni yid shes kyi dbus kyi dbye bas gnyis te /
analyzed: sgra dang yid kyi shes pa ni yid shes kyi dbus kyi dbye bas gnyis te /
translated: Sound and mental consciousness are two, by the division of mental consciousness.

original: de ltar dri dang ro dang reg pa dang skyur ba'i dbye bas bcu drug go //
analyzed: de ltar dri dang ro dang reg pa dang skyur ba'i dbye bas bcu drug go //
translated: Thus, by the division of smell, taste, touch, and sour, there are sixteen.

original: rig pa bcu gcig 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rig pa bcu gcig 'di lta ste /
translated: The eleven faculties are as follows:

original: sra ba dang / snyi ba dang / dro ba dang / grang ba dang / btang snyoms dang / lci ba dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'o //
analyzed: sra ba dang / snyi ba dang / dro ba dang / grang ba dang / btang snyoms dang / lci ba dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa'o //
translated: hardness, softness, heat, cold, equanimity, heaviness, lightness, smoothness, roughness, hunger, and thirst.

original: bden pa yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
translated: The truth is well summarized.

original: yid kyi shes pa'i dbye bas gsum ste /
analyzed: yid kyi shes pa'i dbye bas gsum ste /
translated: Mental consciousness is three, by the division of mental consciousness.

original: de ltar gang zhig gi 'byung ba mig gi don byed pa dang khams rtogs pa dang / snang ba'i sa'i dbye ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa yang dag par bsdus pa gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i khyab pa bstan te /
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig gi 'byung ba mig gi don byed pa dang khams rtogs pa dang / snang ba'i sa'i dbye ba dang 'das pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa yang dag par bsdus pa gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i khyab pa bstan te /
translated: Thus, the chapter on the form aggregate is well summarized, with the division of the elements that function as objects of the eye, the division of the earth of appearance, and the division of the past, etc., with infinite divisions.

original: gzugs kyi mthar dbyu gu lta bu 'dul ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi mthar dbyu gu lta bu 'dul ba zhes pa'o //
translated: At the end of form, there is the taming of the staff.

original: tshor ba'i phung po la gsum ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po la gsum ste /
translated: The aggregate of feeling is threefold:

original: gnyis kyis nus pas bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang btang snyoms so //
analyzed: gnyis kyis nus pas bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang btang snyoms so //
translated: pleasant, unpleasant, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: mig gi don byed pa'i rgyun gyi dbye bas rab tu byed pa drug pa ste /
analyzed: mig gi don byed pa'i rgyun gyi dbye bas rab tu byed pa drug pa ste /
translated: The sixth chapter is the analysis of the eye, which is the cause of the function of the eye.

original: de ltar dbye ba bco brgyad 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar dbye ba bco brgyad 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, there are eighteen divisions.

original: de ltar sems kyi dbyings rtogs pas gang zhig shin tu dbye bas mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa la mngon par yang dag par bsdus pa tshor ba'i phung po zhes shes rab thob pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sems kyi dbyings rtogs pas gang zhig shin tu dbye bas mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa la mngon par yang dag par bsdus pa tshor ba'i phung po zhes shes rab thob pa'o //
translated: Thus, one who understands the realm of mind attains wisdom, which is called the aggregate of feeling, that is well summarized in the chapter on the infinite divisions.

original: 'du shes kyi phung po'i shes pa drug ste /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po'i shes pa drug ste /
translated: The aggregate of perception is sixfold:

original: mig gi don byed pa la brten pa'i dbye bas bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gzung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi don byed pa la brten pa'i dbye bas bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gzung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the perception of the object of the eye is the apprehension of the sign of the cause of truth.

original: de ltar rgyu mtshan gyi gzugs kyi rnam gzhag gis dbye ba la ba rten pa de ltar brtags pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu mtshan gyi gzugs kyi rnam gzhag gis dbye ba la ba rten pa de ltar brtags pa'o //
translated: Thus, the analysis of the presentation of the form of the sign is the investigation of the basis.

original: @297a * // brjod pa dang brjod pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pas yang dag pa'i phung po'i yul chos kyi bdag nyid dang / nyan pa lta bu'i 'du shes dang khams kyi dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po'i phyi rol du'o //🔽'du byed kyi phung po ji srid du sems yongs su zhi ba rnams dang / dang ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rab tu byed pa'o //
analyzed: @297a * // brjod pa dang brjod pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pas yang dag pa'i phung po'i yul chos kyi bdag nyid dang / nyan pa lta bu'i 'du shes dang khams kyi dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po'i phyi rol du'o // 'du byed kyi phung po ji srid du sems yongs su zhi ba rnams dang / dang ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rab tu byed pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of perception is the perception of the elements, which is the infinite classification of the listeners.🔽The aggregate of formations is the mental training in the practice of the eye, etc., which is the characteristic of clarity, and the mental formation in regard to the Dharma, which is the practice of the defilements through passion, hatred and folly.

original: mig gi don byed pa la rab tu brten pa rab tu rgyas pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang chos kyi sems kyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rnam grangs las 'das pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig gi don byed pa la rab tu brten pa rab tu rgyas pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang chos kyi sems kyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rnam grangs las 'das pa lta bu'o //
translated: The aggregate of consciousness is the characteristic of mental activity, which is the mental training in the practice of the eye, etc., and the mental formation in regard to the Dharma, which is the practice of the defilements through passion, hatred and folly.

original: khams kyi dbye ba yang dag par bsdus pa 'du byed kyi phung po zhes khyab pa bstan to //
analyzed: khams kyi dbye ba yang dag par bsdus pa 'du byed kyi phung po zhes khyab pa bstan to //
translated: The aggregate of formations is indicated as the all-pervading, since it includes the divisions of the elements.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni /
translated: The aggregate of consciousness

original: mngon shes drug gis sku dang mig gi don byed pa la brten pa'i dbye ba ste /
analyzed: mngon shes drug gis sku dang mig gi don byed pa la brten pa'i dbye ba ste /
translated: is the division based on the function of the eye and so on, which is supported by the six superknowledges.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang ; rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i dbye ba dang mi dge bar lung ma bstan pa'i dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa la mos pas mngon par yang dag par bsdus pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes khyab pa'i yul bstan to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang ; rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i dbye ba dang mi dge bar lung ma bstan pa'i dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i rab tu byed pa la mos pas mngon par yang dag par bsdus pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes khyab pa'i yul bstan to //
translated: The aggregate of consciousness is indicated as the all-pervading object, since it includes the divisions of the characteristics of form and the characteristics of consciousness, and the divisions of the non-virtuous and the neutral, and so on, which are infinite.

original: skye ba'i skye mched bcu gnyis te /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye mched bcu gnyis te /
translated: The twelve bases of birth🔽are the six internal and the six external.

original: de ltar mngon shes drug gi bdag nyid ni /
analyzed: de ltar mngon shes drug gi bdag nyid ni /
translated: Thus, the six superknowledges are

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid do //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid do //
translated: the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: de ltar sems rnam par shes pa'i rgyu rnam par shes pa 'di'o //
analyzed: de ltar sems rnam par shes pa'i rgyu rnam par shes pa 'di'o //
translated: Thus, this consciousness is the cause of the mind, consciousness.

original: phyi rol drug ni /
analyzed: phyi rol drug ni /
translated: The six external are

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos so //
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos so //
translated: form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects.

original: sems bden pa dang bcas pa chos thams cad de /
analyzed: sems bden pa dang bcas pa chos thams cad de /
translated: The mind with truth is all phenomena.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes par song ba'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes par song ba'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the past, future, etc. of the mental consciousness.

original: khyad par gyi dngos po mig la sogs pa lnga dang / yul lnga zhes bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi dngos po mig la sogs pa lnga dang / yul lnga zhes bya'o //
translated: The special things are the five beginning with the eye and the five objects.

original: khams bco brgyad dang / skye mched bcu gnyis 'di rnams so //
analyzed: khams bco brgyad dang / skye mched bcu gnyis 'di rnams so //
translated: These are the eighteen elements and the twelve sense bases.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa don byed pa la sogs pa drug dang / reg pa drug ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa don byed pa la sogs pa drug dang / reg pa drug ste /
translated: The six beginning with the eye consciousness performing a function and the six contacts,

original: mig gi reg pa brjod pa'i yid dang / yang dag par reg pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi reg pa brjod pa'i yid dang / yang dag par reg pa'o //
translated: the mental contact described by the eye and the right contact.

original: bden pa'i gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa snod dang / lhan cig dbus su gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan bum pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngos la mig gi don byed par rtogs pa'i dga' ba gsum gyi dbye ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bden pa'i gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa snod dang / lhan cig dbus su gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan bum pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngos la mig gi don byed par rtogs pa'i dga' ba gsum gyi dbye ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: The form of truth, the consciousness of the vessel, and the sign of the middle abiding together, the eye performs a function on the side of the characteristics of the pot. It generates the three divisions of joy.

original: tshor ba mig gi @297b don byed pa yang dag par reg pa'i skye ba drug ste /
analyzed: tshor ba mig gi @297b don byed pa yang dag par reg pa'i skye ba drug ste /
translated: Feeling is the six kinds of contact that arise from the eye and so on.

original: de ltar yang mngon sum gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi dbye bas bco brgyad 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang mngon sum gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi dbye bas bco brgyad 'byung ste /
translated: Thus, there are eighteen kinds of feeling, divided into the happiness and suffering of the five senses and the mind.

original: slar yang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid drug rnams so //
analyzed: slar yang sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid drug rnams so //
translated: Again, there are six characteristics of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis ni /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis ni /
translated: The twelve links of dependent origination are as follows.

original: de ltar yang ma rig pa'i yan lag bden pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin las kyi 'bras bu yang dag par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma rig pa'i yan lag bden pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin las kyi 'bras bu yang dag par 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus, the link of ignorance arises from the mind’s true nature, the result of karma.

original: bdag dang gzhan 'byung ba dang / phung po rnams la dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan 'byung ba dang / phung po rnams la dmigs pa ste /
translated: It arises from self and other, and it focuses on the aggregates.

original: chags pa ster ba'o //
analyzed: chags pa ster ba'o //
translated: It is the giver of attachment.

original: de'i rkyen gyis 'du byed de ltar gsum ste /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis 'du byed de ltar gsum ste /
translated: Conditioned by that, there are formations, which are threefold.

original: mi dge bcu dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu 'phro ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las lam ji ltar rab tu 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: mi dge bcu dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rab tu 'phro ba dang / dge ba bcu'i las lam ji ltar rab tu 'phro ba'o //
translated: The ten unvirtuous actions and the ten virtuous actions are the arising of karma.

original: shin tu bsam gtan gyi gzugs la mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu bsam gtan gyi gzugs la mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: It is the form of the meditative concentration of the one who is very concentrated.

original: de ltar de'i ma rig pa las byung ba de ltar 'du byed do //
analyzed: de ltar de'i ma rig pa las byung ba de ltar 'du byed do //
translated: Thus, from his ignorance, he thus creates the volitions.

original: mig gi don byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dod pa dang / mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i sa bon 'byung ste /
analyzed: mig gi don byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'i 'dod pa dang / mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i sa bon 'byung ste /
translated: The desire and the undesired result of the eye-function consciousness arise as the seed.

original: des na ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: des na ming dang gzugs so //
translated: Therefore, there is name-and-form.

original: skye bas na skye mched ni /
analyzed: skye bas na skye mched ni /
translated: The arising is the sense bases.

original: skye ba'i rnam grangs dang ldan pa'i tshor ba ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i rnam grangs dang ldan pa'i tshor ba ste /
translated: The feeling that is associated with the arising is

original: bzhi'i phung po'o //
analyzed: bzhi'i phung po'o //
translated: the four aggregates.

original: gzugs dang ji ltar 'byor pa la brten pa 'byung ba dang / khu ba las byung ba'i thar ma ldan pa'i sa'i khams ster ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang ji ltar 'byor pa la brten pa 'byung ba dang / khu ba las byung ba'i thar ma ldan pa'i sa'i khams ster ba'o //
translated: The form and the arising that are based on the union are the seed of the semen and blood that is given by the earth element.

original: de ltar ming dang gzugs las skye mched drug gi de nas ming dang gzugs las mig gi don byed pa'i skye mched drug yongs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ming dang gzugs las skye mched drug gi de nas ming dang gzugs las mig gi don byed pa'i skye mched drug yongs su gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus, from the name-and-form, there are the six sense bases. Then, from the name-and-form, there is the transformation of the six sense bases that function as the eye object.

original: de ltar reg pa ni mig gi don byed pa'i gzugs shes pa sngon bzhin du 'das pa'i phyi ma'o //
analyzed: de ltar reg pa ni mig gi don byed pa'i gzugs shes pa sngon bzhin du 'das pa'i phyi ma'o //
translated: Thus, the contact is the eye-function form consciousness that is prior to the knowledge of the subsequent.

original: de'i rkyen gyis nyen pa tshor ba gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis nyen pa tshor ba gsum mo //
translated: and because of that, the three kinds of suffering.

original: de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis sred pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis sred pa'o //
translated: Thus, through the power of ignorance, there is craving.

original: de nas len pa ste /
analyzed: de nas len pa ste /
translated: Then, there is grasping,

original: bde ba'i 'dus byas pa las byung ba gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i 'dus byas pa las byung ba gzugs yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: which is the appropriation of form that arises from the contact of the pleasant.

original: len pa'i rkyen gyis gang zhig 'byung ba de sngon gyi bzhin byas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: len pa'i rkyen gyis gang zhig 'byung ba de sngon gyi bzhin byas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The condition of grasping is the arising of the consciousness characterized by the previous action.

original: de'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis skye ba ste /
translated: The condition of that is birth.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi nus pa de 'di ltar ma rig pa'i bdag nyid nyon mongs pa ste las so//
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi nus pa de 'di ltar ma rig pa'i bdag nyid nyon mongs pa ste las so//
translated: The power of name-and-form is thus the affliction of the nature of ignorance and action.

original: de ltar skye ba yang nyon mongs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar skye ba yang nyon mongs pa ste /
translated: Thus, birth is also the affliction.

original: las dang skye ba'i dbang gis sems rgyun mi 'chad pas 'khor ba'o //🔽de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis gnas pa ni /
analyzed: las dang skye ba'i dbang gis sems rgyun mi 'chad pas 'khor ba'o // de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis gnas pa ni /
translated: Through the power of action and birth, the mind is uninterrupted, and so there is cyclic existence.

original: rang gi skye ba dang rga shi'i phung po rnams ni skye ba dang skye ba'i dngos po 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi skye ba dang rga shi'i phung po rnams ni skye ba dang skye ba'i dngos po 'chi ba'o //
translated: Thus, through the power of ignorance, there is the abiding of the aggregates of birth and old age and death, which is birth and the thing that is born, death.

original: skye ba'i rjes kyi rigs sngon du thogs pa'i bdag nyid @298a * //
analyzed: skye ba'i rjes kyi rigs sngon du thogs pa'i bdag nyid @298a * //
translated: The sequence of birth is preceded by the nature of the prior lineage.

original: kyi dngos po yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: kyi dngos po yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: He gives away all his possessions.

original: de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis rab tu brtags pa'i yid ni //
analyzed: de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis rab tu brtags pa'i yid ni //
translated: Thus, the mind that is imagined through the power of ignorance

original: nyon mongs pa 'di tsam gyi bdag nyid kyi chos so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa 'di tsam gyi bdag nyid kyi chos so //
translated: is a phenomenon that has the nature of just these afflictions.

original: de ltar gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'i chos ni pha rol tu phyin pa yang bcu ste /
analyzed: de ltar gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'i chos ni pha rol tu phyin pa yang bcu ste /
translated: In this way, the phenomena that are the side of the antidotes are the ten perfections.

original: sbyin pa la gsum ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa la gsum ste /
translated: Generosity is threefold:

original: chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa dang / zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'o //
translated: the generosity of giving the Dharma, the generosity of giving material things, and the generosity of giving fearlessness.

original: tshul khrims la gsum ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims la gsum ste /
translated: Discipline is threefold:

original: sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: the discipline of restraint, the discipline of working for the welfare of sentient beings, and the discipline of gathering virtuous dharmas.

original: bzod pa la gsum ste /
analyzed: bzod pa la gsum ste /
translated: Patience is threefold:

original: chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang / sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: the patience of reflecting on the Dharma, the patience of disregarding harm done by others, and the patience of accepting suffering.

original: brtson 'grus la gsum ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus la gsum ste /
translated: Effort is threefold:

original: go cha'i brtson 'grus dang / sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / yongs su mthar thug pa'i brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: go cha'i brtson 'grus dang / sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / yongs su mthar thug pa'i brtson 'grus so //
translated: effort that has gone to the end.

original: bsam gtan la gsum ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan la gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of meditative stabilization:🔽the meditative stabilization that eliminates faults,

original: skyon bsal ba dang gnas pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: skyon bsal ba dang gnas pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba'o //
translated: the meditative stabilization of abiding, and🔽the meditative stabilization of total victory.

original: shes rab la gsum ste /
analyzed: shes rab la gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of wisdom:🔽the wisdom of listening,🔽the wisdom of reflection, and

original: thos pa'i bdag dang / bsam pa'i bdag dang / bsgom pa'i bdag go //
analyzed: thos pa'i bdag dang / bsam pa'i bdag dang / bsgom pa'i bdag go //
translated: the wisdom of meditation.

original: thabs la gsum ste /
analyzed: thabs la gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of skillful means:🔽the skillful means of eliminating one’s own faults,🔽the skillful means of liberating sentient beings, and

original: rang gi skyon bsal ba dang / sems can sgrol ba dang / bde ba myur bar mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi skyon bsal ba dang / sems can sgrol ba dang / bde ba myur bar mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: the skillful means of quickly attaining bliss.

original: smon lam la gsum ste /
analyzed: smon lam la gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of aspiration prayers:🔽the aspiration prayers that are included in the power of the accumulations,🔽the aspiration prayers that are included in the benefit of sentient beings, and

original: tshogs kyi dbang du bsdus pa dang / sems can gyi don rjes su bsdus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dbang du bsdus pa dang / sems can gyi don rjes su bsdus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'o //
translated: the aspiration prayers that purify a buddhafield.

original: stobs la gsum ste /
analyzed: stobs la gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of powers:🔽the power of accomplishing karma,🔽the power of destroying the afflictions, and

original: las sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs 'joms pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs rab tu 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: las sgrub pa dang / nyon mongs 'joms pa dang / bdud kyi phyogs rab tu 'joms pa'o //
translated: the power of completely destroying the side of the māras.

original: ye shes la gsum ste /
analyzed: ye shes la gsum ste /
translated: There are three kinds of exalted wisdom:

original: rnam par mi rtog pa dang // mnyam pa'i byang chub dang / sems can gyi don du thabs bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa dang // mnyam pa'i byang chub dang / sems can gyi don du thabs bskyed pa'o //
translated: the equality of enlightenment, and the development of means for the benefit of beings.

original: 'di rnams kyi sbyin pa byin pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa sngon bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi sbyin pa byin pa byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa sngon bzhin no //
translated: The giving of these, as before, is the generation of the Thought of supreme enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad kyi byams pa la brten nas yongs su goms pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi byams pa la brten nas yongs su goms pa'o //
translated: It is the thorough acquaintance with love for all beings.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar yang 'jig rten pa'i gzhan gyi dang bdag gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa ni de ltar yang 'jig rten pa'i gzhan gyi dang bdag gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The transcendence of this world is the characteristic of the other world, and of oneself.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po phung po rnams kyi bdag nyid rnam par thar pas rab tu brgyan pa'i dngos po dang byang chub tu 'gro ba'i nus pas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po phung po rnams kyi bdag nyid rnam par thar pas rab tu brgyan pa'i dngos po dang byang chub tu 'gro ba'i nus pas so //
translated: The transcendence of the world is the possession of the capacity for enlightenment, and the possession of the adorned state of the liberation of the personality of the aggregates.

original: de ltar yang sa rnams ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ltar yang sa rnams ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Thus, the stages are as follows:

original: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The first stage, the Joyous, is the transcendence of generosity.🔽The second stage, the Stainless, is the transcendence of morality.

original: @298b shin tu mun pa bsal bas dri ma med pa ste /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: @298b shin tu mun pa bsal bas dri ma med pa ste /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is stainless because it has removed the stain of immorality.

original: 'od 'phro ba bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'od 'phro ba bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Shining is the perfection of patience.

original: dgos 'dod thams cad 'grub pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: dgos 'dod thams cad 'grub pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Fulfilling all needs and desires is the perfection of effort.

original: shin tu sbyang dka' bas na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu sbyang dka' bas na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Difficult to conquer is the perfection of meditation.

original: mngon du gyur pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du gyur pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Manifest is the perfection of wisdom.

original: ring du song ba'i bdag nyid kyis thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: ring du song ba'i bdag nyid kyis thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Far-reaching is the perfection of means.

original: mi g-yo bas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo bas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Immovable is the perfection of aspiration.

original: legs pa'i blo gros kyis stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: legs pa'i blo gros kyis stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Excellent mind is the perfection of strength.

original: chos kyi sprin gyis ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes te /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin gyis ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes te /
translated: Dharma cloud is the perfection of pristine awareness.

original: de ltar gang zhig sa la byams pa'i chos shin tu rtogs pa'i bye brag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i byin gyi rlabs nas khyad par gyi grangs las 'das pa rab tu thob pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig sa la byams pa'i chos shin tu rtogs pa'i bye brag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i byin gyi rlabs nas khyad par gyi grangs las 'das pa rab tu thob pa'o //
translated: Thus, the perfections of generosity and so forth are fully attained in their pure form, through the specific realizations of love on the levels.

original: skye ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du smon lam dang stobs mi mnyam pa'i mtha' yas par thun mong ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du smon lam dang stobs mi mnyam pa'i mtha' yas par thun mong ma yin pa ste /
translated: up to the end of birth, with prayers and powers that are not common, that is, not shared with all the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas.

original: nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi mnyam pa de'i rgyun yin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la dmigs pa'i bye brag gis gang zag gi bdag gi rnam pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi mnyam pa de'i rgyun yin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la dmigs pa'i bye brag gis gang zag gi bdag gi rnam pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the personal self is the emptiness of the perfections, which are the cause of that, distinguished by their objects.

original: de ltar de'i bdag nyid mig gi don byed par dbus kyi bdag nyid nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams phyi'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi don byed pa'i gzugs rnams ni de'i ye shes shes pa dang / mngon du mdzad pa'i bdag nyid phyi'i stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar de'i bdag nyid mig gi don byed par dbus kyi bdag nyid nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams phyi'i stong pa nyid dang / mig gi don byed pa'i gzugs rnams ni de'i ye shes shes pa dang / mngon du mdzad pa'i bdag nyid phyi'i stong pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, the eye, which has the nature of the function of the self, is the emptiness of the inner, which has the nature of the middle. The forms of the outer world are the emptiness of the outer. The forms that are the function of the eye are the emptiness of the outer, which has the nature of the manifestation of the knowledge of that.

original: phyogs kyi cha shas kyi snang ba'i dbye bas snod chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid chen po'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha shas kyi snang ba'i dbye bas snod chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid chen po'o //
translated: The great emptiness is the great world vessel, which is empty of the divisions of the appearance of the parts of the directions.

original: ji ltar yongs su brtags pa gzung ba'i rnam pa gsal ba stong pa nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su brtags pa gzung ba'i rnam pa gsal ba stong pa nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is like the clarity of the aspect of the apprehended that is imagined.

original: don dam pa'i stong pa nyid bzhin du don dam pa'i stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa'i stong pa nyid bzhin du don dam pa'i stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is like the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the giving that is manifestly conditioned by the conditioned.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the unconditioned, because it is not a cause.

original: 'dus byas las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i sbyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dus byas las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i sbyin pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is the unconditioned, because it is not a cause.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is the non-apprehension of the extremes of existence and non-existence.🔽The emptiness of what is without beginning and end is the non-apprehension of the beginning and end of cyclic existence.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of nature is the non-apprehension of the nature of the aggregates.🔽The emptiness of all things is the non-apprehension of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics is the non-apprehension of the specific characteristics of the aggregates.

original: 'dus ma byas la mos pa ni longs spyod pa ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis phyi'i 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas la mos pa ni longs spyod pa ma yin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis phyi'i 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the unapprehendable is the non-apprehension of the apprehender.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is the non-apprehension of the inherent existence of the apprehender and apprehended.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of things is the non-apprehension of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the essential nature is the non-apprehension of the essential nature of the aggregates.

original: rgyu ba med pa'i stong pa nyid ni sems las 'das pa'i chos la zhen pa'i blo ni /
analyzed: rgyu ba med pa'i stong pa nyid ni sems las 'das pa'i chos la zhen pa'i blo ni /
translated: The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the essential nature is the non-apprehension of the non-apprehension of the essential nature of the aggregates.

original: gzhan gyi stong pa nyid do //🔽spyod pa las 'das pa'i gzung ba'i dmigs pa yod pa las 'das pa gzhan ma yin pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi stong pa nyid do // spyod pa las 'das pa'i gzung ba'i dmigs pa yod pa las 'das pa gzhan ma yin pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is the non-apprehension of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the non-apprehension of the conditioned.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the non-apprehension of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is the non-apprehension of the extremes of existence and non-existence.🔽The emptiness of what is without beginning and end is the non-apprehension of the beginning and end of cyclic existence.🔽The emptiness of nature is the non-apprehension of the nature of the aggregates.🔽The emptiness of all things is the non-apprehension of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics is the non-apprehension of the specific characteristics of the aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unapprehendable is the non-apprehension of the apprehender.🔽The emptiness of inherent existence is the non-apprehension of the inherent existence of the apprehender and apprehended.

original: mi mnyam pa'i khyad par gang zhig stong pa nyid ces so//
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i khyad par gang zhig stong pa nyid ces so//
translated: The emptiness of the non

original: @299a * // mtha' las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid ni sems de'i rang bzhin phung po lnga mi 'byung ba rnams ji ltar rang bzhin gang zhig rnam par gzhag pa ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: @299a * // mtha' las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid ni sems de'i rang bzhin phung po lnga mi 'byung ba rnams ji ltar rang bzhin gang zhig rnam par gzhag pa ste rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the beyond of the extremes is the nature of that mind, the non-arising of the five aggregates, which is established as any nature, i.e. the emptiness of nature.

original: sems de'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag gis chos thams cad ces bya ste /
analyzed: sems de'i rang bzhin gyi bye brag gis chos thams cad ces bya ste /
translated: All dharmas are called by the particular nature of that mind.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of all dharmas.

original: bdag tu mi 'dzin pa las dang sbyin pa la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag tu mi 'dzin pa las dang sbyin pa la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa'i stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is the emptiness of the self, the non-apprehension of action and the non-apprehension of the objective support.

original: gzungs kyi mtshan nyid las yongs su brtags pa tsam ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi mtshan nyid las yongs su brtags pa tsam ste /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is the emptiness of the characteristics of the dhāraṇī, which is merely imagined.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid do //🔽gang zag dang chos kyi dngos po las de ltar stong pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid do // gang zag dang chos kyi dngos po las de ltar stong pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of the own-characteristic.

original: dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid do ;🔽; gang zhig phung po'i sbyin pa rang bzhin ji ltar brtags pa'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid do ; ; gang zhig phung po'i sbyin pa rang bzhin ji ltar brtags pa'i dngos po ste /
translated: The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the thing is the emptiness of the thing of the individual and the dharma, as it is.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of the non-thing is the emptiness of the non-thing of the individual and the dharma, as it is.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the own-characteristic is the emptiness of the own-characteristic of the aggregates, as it is imagined.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is the emptiness of the ultimate of the aggregates, as it is imagined.

original: de'i dngos po ma yin pa'i phung po rnams la gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan gyis de ltar yang dag par brtags pa'i snang ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ma yin pa'i phung po rnams la gzhan gyi rgyu mtshan gyis de ltar yang dag par brtags pa'i snang ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: The nature of non-entity is emptiness, which is the non-apprehension of the aggregates that are not entities, due to the reason of otherness, and the establishment of the characteristic of appearance that is correctly imagined in that way.

original: de'i mthar rnam par rtog pa bcom pa'i gzugs bcings pa'i dbye ba med pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mthar rnam par rtog pa bcom pa'i gzugs bcings pa'i dbye ba med pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'o //
translated: At the end of that, the end beyond extremes is the non-differentiation of the form that has conquered conceptualization.

original: phung po'i 'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid de gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: phung po'i 'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid de gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of the conceptualization that apprehends the aggregates is non-duality.

original: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'dzin pas mdzad pa ni stong pa nyid rnam pa lnga'i rab tu byed pa mthong ba la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'dzin pas mdzad pa ni stong pa nyid rnam pa lnga'i rab tu byed pa mthong ba la 'jug pa'o //
translated: Thus, the performance by the apprehension of the perfections is the engagement in seeing the exposition of the five types of emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni /
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment are as follows:

original: de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la 'di lta ste /
translated: Thus, with regard to the four establishments of mindfulness, there is:

original: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni /
translated: The establishment of mindfulness of the body.

original: sna tshogs pa nye ba dang ring ba'i bye brag tsam mo //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nye ba dang ring ba'i bye brag tsam mo //
translated: It is merely a matter of the variety of things being near or far.

original: lus kyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The mindfulness of the body is the characteristic of the conceptualization of the apprehension of the body.

original: de ltar tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: Thus, there is the mindfulness of feelings, the mindfulness of the mind, and the mindfulness of dharmas.

original: de ltar bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbye ba ji lta bar mngon sum ni gsum ste /
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbye ba ji lta bar mngon sum ni gsum ste /

analyzed: brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba'o //

original: bye brag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sbyin pa dang / dge ba las sems kyi sdod pa'i sbyor ba chos kyi bdag nyid bzhin dran pa gtso bo ste /
analyzed: bye brag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sbyin pa dang / dge ba las sems kyi sdod pa'i sbyor ba chos kyi bdag nyid bzhin dran pa gtso bo ste /

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes brjod pa'o //

original: de ltar yid skyob pa'i rdzas shes so //
analyzed: de ltar yid skyob pa'i rdzas shes so //

analyzed: dran pa ni @299b mthun pa'i phyogs dang / gnyen po'i phyogs chos so //

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' dag spong bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' dag spong bar bya ba'o //

analyzed: de ltar gnyen po'i phyogs ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is the production of those antidotes that have not yet arisen.

original: skyes pa rnams brtan pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa rnams brtan pa'o //

original: brtson 'grus kyi bdag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'byung ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi bdag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'byung ste /

analyzed: de ltar bden pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub la 'dug pas na brtson 'grus so //

original: ting nge 'dzin ni shes rab kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni shes rab kyis rab tu bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: Concentration is the establishment of wisdom.

original: de ltar bzhung gi sbyor ba'i spyod yul gyi rgyu mtshan gyi 'bras bu thob pa las rang rig pa'i so sor dmigs pa rab tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar bzhung gi sbyor ba'i spyod yul gyi rgyu mtshan gyi 'bras bu thob pa las rang rig pa'i so sor dmigs pa rab tu gsal ba'o //

original: 'dun pa la dmigs pa bzhin te /
analyzed: 'dun pa la dmigs pa bzhin te /
translated: It is like the focus on aspiration.

original: ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: It is concentration.

translated: The four bases of supernatural powers are the four latent tendencies that are related to the conditioned, based on the subtle cessation that is the opposite of the discordant class, in dependence on the aspects of body and mind.

original: de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i grangs kyi 'bras bu ni dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sbyor ba bskyed pa ni /

original: dbang po'i lnga'o //
analyzed: dbang po'i lnga'o //

analyzed: rtse mor gyur pa dang ; yang dag pa gtso zhes bya'o //

analyzed: chos kyi mchog la dbang po dad stobs gtso bo'o zhes so //

analyzed: dad pa shin tu lhag pa mthong ba'i lam mthar thug pa ni /

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul lo //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul lo //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi byang chub kyi yan lag go //

analyzed: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid do //

translated: The meaning of mind is the nature of the realization of the future, which is the reason for engaging in the perfect classification of the qualities of the perfection of the knowledge that tames memory in that way.🔽

original: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
translated: The cause of the engagement of the perfection of the knowledge of the discipline of mindfulness in that way for the sake of the mind is the sign of the future realization of the nature of clarity, which is the branch of enlightenment of equanimity.

analyzed: de tsam gyis 'dir yang dag byang chub kyi dges kyi cha shas 'byung ba zhes pa ni /

original: byang chub kyi yan lag go //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag go //

translated: Right view is

translated: It is right speech, which is the expression of the realization of reality and the engagement with sentient beings.🔽The one who is skilled in the various aspects of right action

analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //

translated: The bodhisattvas should generate the power of the emanation of the body of bliss from the churning of the continuum of the family of complete peace from the higher and higher stages.

original: yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
translated: This is right mindfulness.

original: dran pa la gnas pa 'dis ni rab tu gsal ba ste /
analyzed: dran pa la gnas pa 'dis ni rab tu gsal ba ste /
translated: By abiding in mindfulness, one becomes very clear.

translated: With love, one takes on the self, engages in aspirations, and with immeasurable and innumerable dharmas, one has right awakening.

analyzed: bden pa bzhi ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa phung po'i mthar thug pa'i mtshan nyid do //

original: 'phags pa rnams kyi so so'i rigs te /
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyi so so'i rigs te /
translated: The noble ones' individual lineages

original: kun 'byung gi bden pa'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung gi bden pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i bsdus pa ni ji skad du sdug bsngal bar 'dod pa 'dus byas pa'i rkyen gyi skye ba ni /

analyzed: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags pa'i ma skye pa'i mtshan nyid do //

analyzed: 'gro ba chen po so so phyogs las byung ba de ltar shin tu 'gro ba'i lam gyi bden pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar dmigs pa ni bsam gtan bzhi rnams so //
translated: Thus, the objective supports are the four meditations.

analyzed: de lar rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ni rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: Among them, that which is associated with conceptualization is the enjoyment.

original: rnam par spyod pa ni dga' ba so sor skye ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par spyod pa ni dga' ba so sor skye ba ste /
translated: The enjoyment is the individual generation of joy.

original: dang po'i bsam gtan no //

translated: Thus, in the end, there is complete dispassion for the cessation of the mental states.

analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa las byung ba mtha' yas pa sems can yongs su btang ba byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste tshad med pa bzhi'o //
translated: The infinite forms of mind that arise from the infinite abandonment of sentient beings are the complete path of the bodhisattva. These are the four immeasurables.

original: sems can tshad med pa'i don du tshogs la dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa'i don du tshogs la dmigs pa ni /
translated: The focus on the accumulations for the benefit of infinite sentient beings is as follows.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: byams pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bas nye bar bsdus pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi mthar thug pa dang / rnam pa'i mthar thug par byang chub kyi lam gyi rnam pa'o //
analyzed: byams pas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bas nye bar bsdus pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi mthar thug pa dang / rnam pa'i mthar thug par byang chub kyi lam gyi rnam pa'o //
translated: Through love, one gathers all sentient beings with the motivation of benefit and happiness, and the form of the path to enlightenment is the ultimate in terms of the ultimate limit and the ultimate aspect.

original: de ltar ma rig pa'i sdug bsngal dang sems can la snying rje'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma rig pa'i sdug bsngal dang sems can la snying rje'o //
translated: Thus, there is compassion for sentient beings and the suffering of ignorance.

original: de ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa gnyen po'o //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu bsgrubs pa gnyen po'o //
translated: Thus, the practice is the antidote.

original: phyogs gang zhig rnam pa rnams ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs gang zhig rnam pa rnams ni dga' ba'o //
translated: The aspects are joy.

original: rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyi sa 'byung ba ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sbyin pa ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid kyi sa 'byung ba ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa sbyin pa ni /
translated: The ground of the mind of awakening is the generation of the mind of awakening.

original: gang zhig rigs kyi dge ba sems can gyi don du bde ba bskyed par rab tu sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig rigs kyi dge ba sems can gyi don du bde ba bskyed par rab tu sgrub pa'o //
translated: The ground of the mind of generosity is the accomplishment of the virtue of the spiritual affinity for the sake of sentient beings, which generates happiness.🔽The ground of the mind of equanimity is the cultivation of equanimity that arises from the attainment of happiness.🔽The ground of the mind of liberation is the engagement in the activity of liberating sentient beings in stages.

original: bde ba'i rjes su dngos po las byung ba'i btang snyoms bsgom pa'i bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i las 'jug pa'i rim pas rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba'i ro myong ba thams cad bag med pa la /
analyzed: bde ba'i rjes su dngos po las byung ba'i btang snyoms bsgom pa'i bye brag gi rjes su 'gro ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i las 'jug pa'i rim pas rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba'i ro myong ba thams cad bag med pa la /
translated: The ground of the mind of the taste of meditative concentration is the experience of all the happiness of meditative concentration.

original: gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'i sems kyi dkyil du gnas pa'i rnam pa'o //🔽de ltar tshad med par grol ba rnams rjes su 'dzin pa ni tshad med pa'i sems so //
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'i sems kyi dkyil du gnas pa'i rnam pa'o // de ltar tshad med par grol ba rnams rjes su 'dzin pa ni tshad med pa'i sems so //
translated: The ground of the mind of heedfulness is the antidote that arises in the center of the mind.🔽Thus, the mind of immeasurable liberation is the mind that embraces the immeasurable.

original: bsam gtan gyis bskyed pa'i sems tshad med pa'i chos so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis bskyed pa'i sems tshad med pa'i chos so //
translated: The immeasurable phenomena generated by meditative concentration are the immeasurable.

original: so sor ldan pa'i don du bdag med pa'i chos bde ba'i byang chub tshad med pa la 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa la thams cad dang ldan pas so sor dmigs pa'i gtso bo'i gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba dang / de'i zag pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: so sor ldan pa'i don du bdag med pa'i chos bde ba'i byang chub tshad med pa la 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa la thams cad dang ldan pas so sor dmigs pa'i gtso bo'i gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba dang / de'i zag pa ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The meaning of “endowed with each” is that, by being endowed with all the excellent qualities of engaging in the immeasurable bliss of the Dharma of selflessness, the antidote to the form-perceptions of the primary objects of observation arises.

original: nam mkha' lta bu stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu stong pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: Its outflows are the formless meditative stabilizations, such as the meditative stabilization of emptiness that is like space.

original: de ltar gzugs ni thogs pa dang bcas pa sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes mnyam pa'i rim pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar gzugs ni thogs pa dang bcas pa sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes mnyam pa'i rim pa ste /
translated: Thus, form is the various perceptions that are impeded, the stages of sameness,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas zhes so //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas zhes so //
translated: and is called “infinite space.”

original: rab tu sbyor ba gsal ba'i btang snyoms kyi rnam pa sems kyis gzung ba'i mtshan nyid de nam mkha'i 'du shes nges pa las mthar rnam par shes pa zhes te /
analyzed: rab tu sbyor ba gsal ba'i btang snyoms kyi rnam pa sems kyis gzung ba'i mtshan nyid de nam mkha'i 'du shes nges pa las mthar rnam par shes pa zhes te /
translated: The aspect of equanimity that is the clarity of application is the character of the mind’s apprehension. That is the definite perception of space. In the end, it is called “consciousness.”

original: rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa'i mtha' yas pa rdzogs @301b pa'o ;
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa'i mtha' yas pa rdzogs @301b pa'o ;
translated: The various infinite consciousnesses are completed.

original: ; de bzhin nyid du med pa ji ltar zhes te /
analyzed: ; de bzhin nyid du med pa ji ltar zhes te /
translated: How can it be that which does not exist in reality?

original: ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The sphere of nothing whatsoever is perfected.

original: de ltar 'du shes pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i skye mched rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'du shes pa rnams dang 'du shes med pa'i skye mched rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Thus, the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception is perfected.

original: de rnams zhi ba'i gnas pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams zhi ba'i gnas pa bzhin no //
translated: Like the state of peace of those.

original: 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa gsal ba'i dmigs pa thams cad thogs pa med pa'i bya ba'i las gzhan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa gsal ba'i dmigs pa thams cad thogs pa med pa'i bya ba'i las gzhan pa'o //
translated: The other is the function of unobstructed activity towards all objects, with the aspect of non-desire.

original: ji ltar mngon par dgongs pa'i snang bas gsal ba'i don du rnam par thar pa brgyad de /🔽de ltar nges par gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi dbye ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs ni /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par dgongs pa'i snang bas gsal ba'i don du rnam par thar pa brgyad de / de ltar nges par gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi dbye ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs ni /
translated: The eight liberations are for the purpose of illuminating the meaning of the appearances of the transcendent wisdom that is intended.

original: mthong ba las 'das pa dang po'o //
analyzed: mthong ba las 'das pa dang po'o //
translated: Thus, the first is the transcendence of seeing the form of desire, by the division of the perception of form.

original: nges par gzugs kyi 'du shes kyis bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kyi gzugs phyi'i gzugs las 'das pa'i gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: nges par gzugs kyi 'du shes kyis bsam gtan gyi bdag nyid kyi gzugs phyi'i gzugs las 'das pa'i gnyis pa'o //
translated: The second is the transcendence of external form, by the perception of form in the nature of concentration.

original: shin tu dge ba la mos pa'i gzugs su 'dod pa la gnas pa las 'das pa ni gsum pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu dge ba la mos pa'i gzugs su 'dod pa la gnas pa las 'das pa ni gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is the transcendence of the abode of desire for form, by the aspiration for extremely virtuous form.

original: 'dod pa min pa las gsal ba dang / gzugs kyi zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs las snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa min pa las gsal ba dang / gzugs kyi zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs las snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the opposite of desire, and it is the meditative attainment of form from the form realm that is subject to the impurities.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de ltar 'dir 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched las mnyam par gzhag pa sngon gyi sems mngon par 'dus byas pa 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / de ltar 'dir 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched las mnyam par gzhag pa sngon gyi sems mngon par 'dus byas pa 'gog pa ste /
translated: The meditative attainment of cessation is the non-manifestation of mind that is preceded by the meditative attainment of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.

original: rab tu gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin bskyed pa'i snang bas sgrib pa so sor bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de ltar byas pa'i 'dod pas nges par gsal ba la gnas pa'i nus pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin bskyed pa'i snang bas sgrib pa so sor bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de ltar byas pa'i 'dod pas nges par gsal ba la gnas pa'i nus pa'o //
translated: It is the clear manifestation of the nature of phenomena that is produced by the light of meditative concentration, which has the characteristic of the individual removal of obscurations, and it is the ability to remain in clear manifestation through the attainment of the desire that is produced by that.

original: rang dang gzhan gyi 'brel pa 'chad pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa sngon gyi gnas la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi 'brel pa 'chad pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa sngon gyi gnas la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the meditative attainment of the various aspects of the former abodes of oneself and others.

original: bsam gtan bzhi nges par zag pa med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi nges par zag pa med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is the four meditative concentrations, the meditative attainments of the formless realm, and the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: de ltar 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nyon mongs pa las mngon du phyogs pa'i nus pas rab tu gsal ba /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nyon mongs pa las mngon du phyogs pa'i nus pas rab tu gsal ba /
translated: Thus, here the bodhisattvas are very clear in their ability to face the afflictions.

original: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the concentration of the lion's play.

original: mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i mtshams kyi rjes su bsam gtan dang po'i rjes su 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas yang phung po la mnyam bzhag ces pa'o //🔽de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa'i rjes su rim pa gsal ba mi rtag par bskyed pa'i sgo las mngon par gsal ba'i bdag nyid grub pa'i rang gi @302a * //
analyzed: mnyam par ma gzhag pa'i mtshams kyi rjes su bsam gtan dang po'i rjes su 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas yang phung po la mnyam bzhag ces pa'o // de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa'i rjes su rim pa gsal ba mi rtag par bskyed pa'i sgo las mngon par gsal ba'i bdag nyid grub pa'i rang gi @302a * //
translated: After the state of composure without meditative equipoise, he enters the state of composure that is the cessation that follows the first concentration, and then again enters meditative equipoise on the aggregates.

original: sems kyis dbang du gnas pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa shes rab tu snang ba ni /
analyzed: sems kyis dbang du gnas pa'i mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa shes rab tu snang ba ni /
translated: Thus, after the complete maturation of sentient beings, the stage is clear. The door to the generation of impermanence is very clear. The nature of accomplishment is one's own mind. Abiding in control through superknowledge is endowed with the perfection of wisdom. The appearance of wisdom

original: chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: is the characteristic of the complete inclusion of all phenomena.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ni /
translated: The three doors of liberation are

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de /
translated: the door of liberation of emptiness,

original: de ltar chos kyi bdag gi dbye bas phung po la sogs pa'i rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi bdag gi dbye bas phung po la sogs pa'i rdzas sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Thus, the characteristics of the various substances of the aggregates, etc., are due to the differentiation of the self of dharmas.

original: de ltar phung po la sogs pa'i dge ba'i yongs brtags pa'i rgyu mtshan du sgom pa stong pa nyid bzhin /
analyzed: de ltar phung po la sogs pa'i dge ba'i yongs brtags pa'i rgyu mtshan du sgom pa stong pa nyid bzhin /
translated: Thus, the cultivation of the emptiness of the aggregates, etc., is the sign of the cause of the virtuous imputational [nature].

original: 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid nyon mongs pa'i shes pa gnyen po'i phyogs pa las byung ba'i rgyu mtshan rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid nyon mongs pa'i shes pa gnyen po'i phyogs pa las byung ba'i rgyu mtshan rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: The sign of the arising of the afflicted consciousness, which has the nature of the various apprehending [aspects], is the door of liberation of the side of the antidote.

original: rgyu mtshan med par byas pa'i phyi'i phung po nyon mongs pa'i shes pa gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba thogs pa med pa rab tu gsal ba'i smon lam med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par byas pa'i phyi'i phung po nyon mongs pa'i shes pa gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba thogs pa med pa rab tu gsal ba'i smon lam med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: The door of liberation of the wishless [aspect] is the sign of the arising of the afflicted consciousness, which has the nature of the various apprehended [aspects], due to the side of the antidote, which is unimpeded and very clear, because it is made signless.

original: de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bye brag gi sa 'das pa'i phung po dang / skye mched dang khams rab tu rgyas pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bye brag gi sa 'das pa'i phung po dang / skye mched dang khams rab tu rgyas pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i don du'o //
translated: Thus, the aggregates, sense spheres, and constituents of the past are the various distinctions of the doors of liberation, for the sake of perfecting the accumulations of the perfections.

original: gzhan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and others will see the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dngos po mnyam pa'i mngon sum du mngon par shes pa drug ni /
analyzed: dngos po mnyam pa'i mngon sum du mngon par shes pa drug ni /
translated: The direct perception of the equality of things is the six higher perceptions.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang de ltar lhag ma rnams dag pa dad ma dag pa'i rnam pa'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs kyi spyod yul te /
analyzed: lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang de ltar lhag ma rnams dag pa dad ma dag pa'i rnam pa'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs kyi spyod yul te /
translated: The higher perception of the divine eye and the rest, up to the end of the pure and impure realms, is the domain of form.

original: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'o //🔽de ltar 'dun pa'i spyod yul ni de bzhin gzhan gyi sems thams cad shes pa'i spyod yul te /
analyzed: lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa'o // de ltar 'dun pa'i spyod yul ni de bzhin gzhan gyi sems thams cad shes pa'i spyod yul te /
translated: The higher perception of the divine ear is the same.🔽The domain of aspiration is the domain of knowing the minds of all others.

original: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa'o //
translated: The higher perception of knowing the minds of others is the same.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi lhag ma med pa'i skye ba'i dbye ba'i spyod yul sngon gyi bag chags dran pa'o //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi lhag ma med pa'i skye ba'i dbye ba'i spyod yul sngon gyi bag chags dran pa'o //
translated: The domain of the recollection of past traces without remainder of self and others is the recollection of past lives.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon shes kyi ye shes ni gsum ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon shes kyi ye shes ni gsum ste /
translated: The knowledge of the higher perception of miraculous powers is threefold.

original: 'dul ba'i rjes su skyes pa'i ji ltar mngon par dgongs pa lhag pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i rjes su skyes pa'i ji ltar mngon par dgongs pa lhag pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par mthong ba'o //
translated: The world is seen as it is intended to be seen, without any higher intention, in accordance with the Vinaya.

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya bas rab tu brtags pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par dgongs pa'i bdag nyid yang dag par mthong ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya bas rab tu brtags pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par dgongs pa'i bdag nyid yang dag par mthong ba'o //
translated: The world is seen as it is intended to be seen, in accordance with the investigation of the activity of moving through space.

original: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes ni de ltar zag pa med pa ji lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ma rig pa'i chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa zad pa'i ye shes ni de ltar zag pa med pa ji lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ma rig pa'i chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: The knowledge of the exhaustion of the outflows is free from the attachment of ignorance, which is the clarity of the knowledge of the way the outflows do not exist.

original: lnga ni de ltar mi zad par song ba @302b ye shes rab tu gsal ba'i rgyus brlan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sbyin pa gsum ni ji ltar phyin ci log ces pa de ltar du mngon par shes pa ni nyan thos kyi lam las thun mong ma yin par yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu mtshan lhun gyis grub pa phyi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs so
analyzed: lnga ni de ltar mi zad par song ba @302b ye shes rab tu gsal ba'i rgyus brlan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems sbyin pa gsum ni ji ltar phyin ci log ces pa de ltar du mngon par shes pa ni nyan thos kyi lam las thun mong ma yin par yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu mtshan lhun gyis grub pa phyi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs so
translated: The five, the three of generosity and so forth, are moistened by the cause of the clarity of knowledge, which is the cause of the perfection of the unmistaken superknowledges that are not in common with the path of the śrāvakas. The sign of the cause is the spontaneous outer perfection of the accumulation.

original: // lam mnyam par mngon par yang dag par bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: // lam mnyam par mngon par yang dag par bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the path is the perfect inclusion of equality.

original: rang gi stobs mtha' yas pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par dgongs pa'i gnas las ring du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi stobs mtha' yas pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par dgongs pa'i gnas las ring du spyod pa'o //
translated: The practice of the infinite power of one's own is the far-reaching abode of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: mnyam pa'i mchog tu dge ba'i gcig 'dzin pa rab tu gsal ba ste /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i mchog tu dge ba'i gcig 'dzin pa rab tu gsal ba ste /
translated: The supreme equality of the virtuous is the clear grasping of the one.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The characteristic of the first concentration is as follows.

original: ji ltar dmigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbye ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbye ba ste /
translated: The classification of the perfections that follow the object of observation is the grasping of the one.

original: 'dzin pa'o // de ltar chos thams cad aa las byung ba'i sgo'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'o // de ltar chos thams cad aa las byung ba'i sgo'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is the door of arising from a.

original: chos kyi brda'i rjes su 'brangs nas dbyangs dang gsal byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi brda'i rjes su 'brangs nas dbyangs dang gsal byed do //
translated: Following the sign of the Dharma, there are vowels and consonants.

original: de'i don gyi rgyu mtshan gyis shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gsal ba nges pa'i rgyu ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i don gyi rgyu mtshan gyis shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin gsal ba nges pa'i rgyu ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'o //
translated: The cause of the ascertainment of the clear nature of the knowledge and perfection that is the reason for that meaning is the arising of the side of the antidote that is the friend of concentration.

original: gang zhig gzhan gyi byang chub thob pa'i sems 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan gyi byang chub thob pa'i sems 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is the mind that holds the attainment of enlightenment for others.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs rab tu gsal ba rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mngon sum du mdzad pa mnyam pa'i dngos po aa las byung ba'i ye shes mnyam pa'i bdag nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs rab tu gsal ba rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mngon sum du mdzad pa mnyam pa'i dngos po aa las byung ba'i ye shes mnyam pa'i bdag nyid de /
translated: Thus, the dhāraṇī of samādhi is the direct realization of vajra-like concentration, which is the wisdom arisen from the letter A, the nature of equality.

original: bag chags thams cad kyi rjes kyi rgyun spangs pa snying rje chen po'i sbyor bas spangs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bag chags thams cad kyi rjes kyi rgyun spangs pa snying rje chen po'i sbyor bas spangs par mdzad pa'o //

analyzed: chos kyi rnam par thar pa mthong ba'i rnam par smin pa mnyam pa'i bya ba la gnas pa'o //

original: 'di lta ste /

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //

original: dbyings kyi rigs so //

original: tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //

original: de ltar ba'i lam mo//
analyzed: de ltar ba'i lam mo//

analyzed: de ltar sna tshogs par mi zad par 'gro ba ni ma rig pa ste /

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te /

original: 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so //🔽sgrib pa thams cad kyi bag la zha las grol ba'i rnam pa'i lhag ma rnams rjes su bzung ba'o //

original: de'i rnam par smin pa'i nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa'i nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i spyod yul lo //
translated: The power of the knowledge of the different aspirations.🔽The power of the knowledge of the different elements.

original: lha'i mig gi mngon shes so //
analyzed: lha'i mig gi mngon shes so //
translated: The power of the knowledge of the different faculties.🔽The power of the knowledge of the path that leads everywhere.🔽The power of the knowledge of the absorptions, liberations, concentrations and attainments.

analyzed: de ltar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
translated: The power of the knowledge of recollecting former abodes.🔽The power of the knowledge of death and birth.🔽The power of the knowledge of the destruction of defilements.

original: 'dir me long lta bu'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs kyi bye brag gsal bar mdzad pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam par gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i spros pa dang bcas par shin tu 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir me long lta bu'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs kyi bye brag gsal bar mdzad pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam par gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i spros pa dang bcas par shin tu 'gro ba ste /
translated: Here, mirror-like wisdom is the non-conceptual state of the Bhagavat, which is the cause of the manifestation of the particular powers of his nature, and which is the basis of the other wisdoms.

original: 'di'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skyon rab tu gsal ba'o//
analyzed: 'di'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skyon rab tu gsal ba'o//
translated: It is the manifestation of all the excellences of his powers.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
translated: The four forms of fearlessness are
