original: ye shes kyi yul de bzhin nyid dang byang chub bo //
analyzed: ye shes kyi yul de bzhin nyid dang byang chub bo //
translated: The object of perfect knowledge is suchness and enlightenment.

original: rigs pa'i rjes su thob pa'o //
analyzed: rigs pa'i rjes su thob pa'o //
translated: It is attained by means of reasoning.

original: 'jigs pa med pas na mi 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pas na mi 'jigs pa'o //
translated: It is fearlessness because it is free from fear.

original: 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: This is the wisdom of equality.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du mthong ba dang bcas pas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa sems rnam par dag pa'i nga rgyal du sgom pa'o //
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du mthong ba dang bcas pas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa sems rnam par dag pa'i nga rgyal du sgom pa'o //
translated: Like a wish-fulfilling gem, one should cultivate the pride of the pure mind of sameness toward all sentient beings.

original: de ltar shin tu 'das pa'i sbyor bas chos thams cad me long lta bu'i ye shes rab tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar shin tu 'das pa'i sbyor bas chos thams cad me long lta bu'i ye shes rab tu gsal ba'o //
translated: Thus, by the application of transcending, all phenomena are clearly seen as mirror-like wisdom.

original: don gyi mthar thug @303b par sems can 'dul ba dang skye bas bzung ba'i gti mug dang bcas pa gzhan las chos kyi sku brten pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi mthar thug @303b par sems can 'dul ba dang skye bas bzung ba'i gti mug dang bcas pa gzhan las chos kyi sku brten pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The ultimate meaning is the dharmakāya, which is the form of the tathāgatas, the nature of the mind, the ultimate reality, the ultimate truth, and the ultimate of all phenomena.

original: de ltar so sor rig pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar so sor rig pa ni /
translated: Thus, the discernment of that is

original: don so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
translated: the correct understanding of the meaning.

analyzed: sems can thams cad bdag tu byas pa'i rnam pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba rnams ni chos so so yang dag pa'o //
translated: The extremely subtle wisdoms that take all sentient beings as oneself are the correct understanding of the Dharma.

original: de'i tshul las byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshul las byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Its characteristic arises from that method.

original: nges pa'i tshig so sor rig pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so sor rig pa'o //
translated: It is the correct understanding of language.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi brda las byung ba'i rnam byang ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi brda las byung ba'i rnam byang ste /
translated: The purification that arises from the symbols of the nature🔽The correct understanding of eloquence is the correct understanding of the Dharma.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
translated: It is the analytical knowledge of eloquence.

original: kun dga' bar bskyed pa'i rang bzhin rab tu gsal ba'i rnam dbye'o //
analyzed: kun dga' bar bskyed pa'i rang bzhin rab tu gsal ba'i rnam dbye'o //
translated: It is the analytical knowledge of the teaching, which is the clear distinction of the nature of the generation of joy.

original: sems can gyi don la byed pas bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: sems can gyi don la byed pas bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: It is the knowledge of achieving activities, which is the performance of the aims of beings.

original: rab tu gsal ba'i bde ba sems can 'dul ba'i rgyur lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyu mtshan rab tu gsal ba'i byams pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba'i bde ba sems can 'dul ba'i rgyur lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyu mtshan rab tu gsal ba'i byams pa chen po'o //
translated: It is great compassion, which is the cause of the spontaneous, clear manifestation of the Tathāgata’s great love for the discipline of beings, which is the cause of the clear manifestation of happiness.

original: 'dul dka' 'dul ba'i rgyu ni snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: 'dul dka' 'dul ba'i rgyu ni snying rje chen po'o //
translated: It is great compassion, which is the cause of the discipline of those difficult to discipline.

original: de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Thus it is the nature of the purification of the realm of the Dharma.

original: nyan thos rnams la thun mong ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nyan thos rnams la thun mong ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The eighteen special qualities of the Buddha are not shared by the disciples.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o //
translated: The Tathāgata has no error.

original: gzhan dag ni yang dag par 'khrul pas ma zhi ba'i rgyu ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni yang dag par 'khrul pas ma zhi ba'i rgyu ni /
translated: Others, because of error, have the cause of non-peace.

original: lus kyi skyon no //
analyzed: lus kyi skyon no //
translated: It is the fault of the body.

original: ca co mi mnga' ste /
analyzed: ca co mi mnga' ste /
translated: He has no loss of memory.

original: ca co ni ngag gi skyon no //
analyzed: ca co ni ngag gi skyon no //
translated: It is the fault of speech.

original: dran pa nyams pa med de /
analyzed: dran pa nyams pa med de /
translated: He has no loss of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nyams pa ni sems kyi skyon no //
analyzed: dran pa nyams pa ni sems kyi skyon no //
translated: The loss of mindfulness is a fault of the mind.

original: sems can sna tshogs pa rnams la tha dad pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa dang ldan pa mi mnga'o //
analyzed: sems can sna tshogs pa rnams la tha dad pa'i 'du shes la sogs pa dang ldan pa mi mnga'o //

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems mi mnga'o //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems mi mnga'o //
translated: He does not have a mind that is not in equipoise.

analyzed: rmongs pa dang bcas pa ni sems can gyi don rnam par g-yengs pa'i mtshan nyid do //

original: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o //
analyzed: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o //
translated: He does not have a mind that is indifferent without examination.

original: blo dman pas /
analyzed: blo dman pas /
translated: He does not have a mind that is inferior.

original: sngon sems can gyi don la thugs chung ngu la gzhol ba'o //
analyzed: sngon sems can gyi don la thugs chung ngu la gzhol ba'o //
translated: He does not have a mind that is indifferent to the welfare of sentient beings.

original: 'di rnams ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o //
translated: These are the concordances with the training in superior morality.

analyzed: rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu ni dad pas bcom pa med pa'o //
translated: The cause of the non-abiding nirvana is the absence of destruction by faith.

original: sdig pa la rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu ni /
analyzed: sdig pa la rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu ni /
translated: The cause of the nirvana that is not a dwelling in evil is

analyzed: sgyu bar 'gro ba'o //
translated: the going of a magician.

analyzed: 'dun pa nyams pa med de sdig pa la rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i gang zhig dga' bas so //
translated: There is no decline in aspiration, because of the delight in nirvana, which is not a state of sin.

original: brtson 'grus nyams pa med de /
analyzed: brtson 'grus nyams pa med de /
translated: There is no decline in effort,

analyzed: sdig pa'i don du tsho'i 'dus byas pa sna tshogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: because of the blessing of various kinds of activity for the sake of sentient beings.

original: shes rab nyams pa med de /
analyzed: shes rab nyams pa med de /
translated: There is no decline in wisdom,

original: sdig pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i 'gro ba'i bya ba la sku'i yon tan drug 'gyur gyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: sdig pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i 'gro ba'i bya ba la sku'i yon tan drug 'gyur gyi dbye ba'o //
translated: because of the sixfold excellence of the body in the performance of actions for the sake of sentient beings, which transcends the limits of sin.

original: rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa ste /
translated: There is no decline in liberation,

original: sdig pas nyan thos mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu mtshan du gzung ba'o //
analyzed: sdig pas nyan thos mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu mtshan du gzung ba'o //

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes nyams pa med de /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes nyams pa med de /
translated: There is no decline in the wisdom of liberation,

original: sdig pa la sogs @304a * //
analyzed: sdig pa la sogs @304a * //
translated: because of the nonapprehending of the nirvana of the pratyekabuddhas as a sign of sin.

translated: The fivefold analysis is the activity of the buddhas, which is the condition for the knowledge of the benefit of sentient beings, and it is the various kinds of nirvana that are not a state of sin.

analyzed: 'di rnams ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: These are the natural outflow of the training in the higher wisdom.

translated: All his physical actions are preceded and followed by wisdom, and they are accompanied by the light of the highest wisdom, which is the cause of the infinite variety of beings’ faith in all the world systems of a billion universes.

analyzed: ye shes kyi rjes su rtogs pa de dang / gzhan longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sbyin pa'o //
translated: This is the generosity of the enjoyment body, which is preceded and followed by wisdom.

original: de ltar ngag gi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar ngag gi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo //
